name: Android Cop
description: In the year 2045, a L.A.P.D. detective and his new Android partner enter the Zone, which is a forbidden section of the city plagued with an unknown disease. Together, they discover the reason everyone is sick, and try to stop the ...

review.author: pete1-2
review.heading: Robocop Ripoff made on a $1000.00 budget
review.reviewBody: Okay it's another typical Asylum ripoff of an old classic science fiction movie. It's so bad it's comical but maybe that's the point. It has bad acting, bad FX and a bad script. So if you want to see a cheesy spoof, this might give you a chuckle or two.
